example.text: Invasion. My sources tell me that 700K illegals from all over the world are stacked up to the ceiling in every Mexican border city hotel. 30-40 to a room. On top of that are thousands of tent camps. Looking like 700K illegal crossings in a 6 week window. Starting this week.
Our border security bill is the most aggressive legislation ever brought to the House floor… [[url]]

rPOTUS Trump got through to iPOTUS Biden, as Biden reinstates Trump’s immigration policy. That’s great Joe, but nothing can stop the human misery you’ve created. 700K illegals are crossing now in a wave of human suffering. You & Mayorkas did that. [[url]]
